subject: America's Cup
Sailboats and Sailing
lead_paragraph: A star in his native France, Peyron is not running his own team in this America's Cup. The odds at this stage are heavily against him and his latest employer, Artemis Racing.
snippet: A star in his native France, Peyron is not running his own team in this America's Cup. The odds at this stage are heavily against him and his latest employer, Artemis Racing.
